trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted"></xref> event of <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref>.

Use <xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs> to obtain information about a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application after the deployment and application manifests have been downloaded.
Gets the context for the current [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
An <xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref> object representing the context for the current application.
Gets a description of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
An <xref href="System.ApplicationIdentity"></xref> object.
Gets the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application manifest for this deployment.
You can use this variable to grab any information you need from the application manifest, such as a list of dependencies, trust information, and so on.
For more information on the structure of this document, see [ClickOnce Application Manifest](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29570cec-4e53-4660-a850-abc4fa150243).
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> representing the application manifest.
Gets the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment manifest for this deployment.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> representing the deployment manifest.
Gets a value indicating whether this [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application is cached.
`true` if the application is cached; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the location of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] error log.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> containing the location of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] error log.
Gets the name of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.

A <xref href="System.String"></xref> representing the product name of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, as stored in the assembly metadata of the application's main executable file.
Gets a string identifying the subscription.
A string with information identifying the subscription.
Gets the location of a Web page users can visit to obtain product support for the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
A containing the value found in the supportUrl attribute of the deployment manifest's tag.
For more information, see [ClickOnce Deployment Manifest](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8457e615-e3b6-4990-8dcf-11bc590e4e9b).
Gets the version of the update for the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
A <xref href="System.Version"></xref> representing the version number contained within the downloaded manifest.
